name: Learning Task
description: Track a roadmap deliverable
body:
  - type: textarea
    id: goal
    attributes:
      label: Objective
      description: What do you intend to learn / build?
  - type: textarea
    id: notes
    attributes:
      label: Notes
      description: Links, videos, docs
  - type: input
    id: est
    attributes:
      label: Time Estimate (hrs)
